fields.label: Short codes in function.php
fields.message:
Read more-------------------------------------------
[readmore] content [/readmore]
[readmore class="sm"] content [/readmore]
Classes can change working in meadia screens : 
sm - work until 576px
md - 768px
lg - 992px
xl - 1200px

CTA button-------------------------------------------
* Changed link and string if user logger
[cta] 
[cta class="btn btn-primary btn-xs" title_logged="example" title_not_logged="example2"] 

class="btn btn-primary btn-xs" - add classes
title_logged="example" - change string for logged user
title_not_logged="example2" - change string for NOT logged user
